name: handlebar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bar with a curved end that you hold when riding a bicycle or motorcycle and use to turn the front wheel so that it points in a different direction: He was hunched over the handlebars, pedalling furiously. You make a turn by twisting the left handlebar.
mattjeacock/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe seat and the handlebars are set slightly lower for a more relaxed riding position.A bicycle was propped against the wall with a jacket hanging over one handlebar. The snowmobile has higher handlebars so you can steer it like a mountain bike. He offered to give her a ride on the handlebars of his bike.There are switches on the left and right handlebar that you use to operate the lights.
